allow:
Bash(echo "Let me check Ryan''s permissions. Please run this SQL query in Supabase and share the output:

SELECT 
  sp.exercises_visibility,
  sp.allowed_exercise_tags,
  p.first_name,
  p.last_name,
  p.app_role
FROM staff_permissions sp
JOIN profiles p ON p.id = sp.staff_id
WHERE sp.staff_id = ''1444c908-d237-4e5d-9e93-a24fb7cd6324'';

This will show Ryan''s current permission settings.")
